headline: NextEra Energy Taps AI Data Center Power Demand With Hyperscaler Deals
summary: NextEra Energy (NYSE:NEE) has signed multi gigawatt clean energy agreements with major hyperscalers, including Google and Meta, to power growing data center demand from AI driven workloads. The company is expanding its nuclear fleet and integrating new technologies to support rising power needs tied to digital infrastructure. These moves position NextEra Energy more directly in the green data center market, connecting its clean energy portfolio with large technology clients. For investors...
